breeds.name: Labrador Retriever
breeds.description: The Labrador Retriever is a friendly and active breed that loves to play and is great with kids. They are known for their intelligence and trainability and are often used as service and therapy dogs.

breeds.name: German Shepherd
breeds.description: The German Shepherd is a loyal and protective breed that is often used as a police or military dog. They are intelligent and obedient, and make great companions for active families.

breeds.name: Bulldog
breeds.description: The Bulldog is a friendly and affectionate breed that is known for its wrinkled face and stocky build. They are great with children and make good apartment dogs. They originated in England.

breeds.name: Poodle
breeds.description: The Poodle is a highly intelligent and trainable breed that comes in a variety of sizes, including toy, miniature, and standard. They are known for their curly, hypoallergenic coat and make great family pets.

breeds.name: Golden Retriever
breeds.description: The Golden Retriever is a friendly and loyal breed that loves to play and is great with kids. They are highly trainable and are often used as service dogs. They originated in Scotland.

breeds.name: Siberian Husky
breeds.description: The Siberian Husky is a friendly and active breed that loves to run and play. They have a thick, double coat that helps them survive in cold climates. They originated in Siberia.

breeds.name: Boxer
breeds.description: The Boxer is a loyal and energetic breed that is great with kids. They are known for their muscular build and cropped ears. They originated in Germany.

breeds.name: Airedale Terrier
breeds.description: His size, strength, and unflagging spirit have earned the Airedale Terrier the nickname 'The King of Terriers'. The Airedale stands among the world's most versatile dog breeds.

breeds.name: Dalmatian
breeds.description: The dignified Dalmatian, dogdom's citizen of the world, is famed for his spotted coat and unique job description. The Dal was originally bred to guard horses and coaches, and some of the old protective instinct remains.

breeds.name: Samoyed
breeds.description: The Samoyed is a substantial but graceful dog. These are smart, social, mischievous dogs who demand love and attention. Sammies need a very firm but loving hand in training.

breeds.name: Pembroke Welsh Corgi
breeds.description: Among the most agreeable of all small housedogs, the Pembroke Welsh Corgi is a strong, athletic, and lively little herder who is affectionate and companionable without being needy.

breeds.name: Teddy Roosevelt Terrier
breeds.description: The Teddy Roosevelt Terrier is a lively, friendly, affectionate dog with his family but can be somewhat of a one-person dog. With his strong protective nature and well-developed pack instincts.
